summary: I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE HIGHWAY WHEN MY CAR SEEMED TO TAKE CONTROL OF ITSELF.  MY TAPE PLAYER QUIT WORKING, MY AIR TURNED OFF.  MY ENGINE WAS ROARING.  PUSHING FORWARD EVEN WITH MY BRAKES ON.  I WAS SHAKING AND CRYING I COULD NOT CONTROL MY CAR IT WAS TRYING TO MOVE INTO THE INTERSECTION WITH A RED LIGHT.  I COULD NOT CONTROL THE MOVEMENT.  I FELT LIKE MY CAR WAS POSSESSED WITH IT'S OWN MIND.    THE CAR REPAIR SHOP REPLACED IT'S ALTERNATOR.  I AM ON MY 4TH ALTERNATOR THE CAR IS STILL IN THE SHOP IT CAN NOT BE DRIVEN ON THE ROAD SAFELY.  THEY HAVE TRIED REPLACING SOME WIRING.  STILL IS NOT WORKING.  *NM
